column4: Hi, I need to run 'apt-get dist-upgrade' in the early hours of the morning. I have entered 'apt-get -y dist-upgrade' in root's crontab and using 'top' I can tell it runs. But it does not update. Can someone explain why that might be?
without a a prior apt-get update there is nothing to pgrade
I have manually run apt-get update
do I need to run it in the crontab also?
